meanings.definition: A type of pancake made with buckwheat flour.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious ploye for breakfast this morning.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother makes the best ploye with buckwheat flour.
meanings.sent3: The ploye on my plate looked like a tasty round disk.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly cooked ploye filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown ploye was topped with maple syrup.

meanings.definition: A tactic or strategy used to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent1: The general's clever ploye led to victory in battle.
meanings.sent2: She used a smart ploye to outwit her opponent.
meanings.sent3: His ploye to distract the enemy worked like a charm.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected ploye caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: Her ploye was so cunning that no one saw it coming.
